help.name: mri_surf2volseg
help.description: Performs three functions: (1) cleans up presurf aseg cortex and WM. (2) maps cortical labels from an annotation into a volume, and (3) labels cerebral WM with closest cortical label. This is a replacement for mri_aparc2aseg.

optional-flagged.explanation: Fix the cortical and WM labels in the input segmentation
Relabel cortex in the input segmentation with surface annotation
Relabel cerebral WM in the input segmentation with surface annotation
Relabel unknown WM as lhval and rhval (default is 5001 and 5002)
max dist (mm) from cortex to be labeld as gyral WM (5mm)
do not label WM based on 'unknown' corical label
label hypointensities as WM (when fixing with ribbon)
Number of surface hops when searching for a nearby annot
print out information on how to use this program
test labeling of only the voxel given by col row slice (debuggin)

help.example: To create an aseg.mgz with cortex and white matter fixed cd $SUBJECTS_DIR/subject/mri mri_surf2volseg --i aseg.presurf.hypos.mgz --fix-presurf-with-ribbon ribbon.mgz --o aseg.mgz \ --lh-cortex-mask ../label/lh.cortex.label \ --rh-cortex-mask ../label/rh.cortex.label \ --lh-white ../surf/lh.white --lh-pial ../surf/lh.pial \ --rh-white ../surf/rh.white --rh-pial ../surf/rh.pial

To create an aparc+aseg.mgz (use aseg.mgz from above) cd $SUBJECTS_DIR/subject/mri mri_surf2volseg --i aseg.mgz --label-cortex --o aparc+aseg.mgz \ --lh-annot ../label/lh.aparc.annot 1000 --rh-annot ../label/rh.aparc.annot 2000\ --lh-cortex-mask ../label/lh.cortex.label --rh-cortex-mask ../label/rh.cortex.label \ --lh-white ../surf/lh.white --lh-pial ../surf/lh.pial \ --rh-white ../surf/rh.white --rh-pial ../surf/rh.pial

To create an wmaparc.mgz (use aseg.mgz from above) cd $SUBJECTS_DIR/subject/mri mri_surf2volseg --i aparc+aseg.mgz --label-wm --o wmaparc.mgz \ --lh-annot ../label/lh.aparc.annot 3000 --rh-annot ../label/rh.aparc.annot 4000\ --lh-cortex-mask ../label/lh.cortex.label --rh-cortex-mask ../label/rh.cortex.label \ --lh-white ../surf/lh.white --lh-pial ../surf/lh.pial \ --rh-white ../surf/rh.white --rh-pial ../surf/rh.pial

To create an aparc.a2009s+aseg.mgz (use aseg.mgz from above) cd $SUBJECTS_DIR/subject/mri mri_surf2volseg --i aseg.mgz --label-cortex --o aparc.a2009s+aseg.mgz \ --lh-annot ../label/lh.aparc.a2009s.annot 11100 --rh-annot ../label/rh.aparc.a2009s.annot 12100\ --lh-cortex-mask ../label/lh.cortex.label --rh-cortex-mask ../label/rh.cortex.label \ --lh-white ../surf/lh.white --lh-pial ../surf/lh.pial \ --rh-white ../surf/rh.white --rh-pial ../surf/rh.pial
